★隊士数★
Force numbers

・文久三年三月��１３人（２４人という説も）
Bunkyu 3, 3rd month (April 1863)-- 13 people (rumored to actually be 24 
people)

・元治元年六月（池田屋事件の頃）��８３人
Genji 1, 6th month (July 1864, around the time of the Ikedaya Incident)-- 83 
people

・一番多かった時��１７０～１８０人
At peak strength-- 170 to 180 people

・鳥羽伏見直前��６６人
Just before the Battle of Toba-Fushimi-- 66 people
